to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to set active tab index of first window to 1'
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to set active tab index of first window to 2'
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to set active tab index of first window to 3'
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to set active tab index of first window to 4'
osascript -e 'tell application "Google Chrome" to set active tab index of first window to 5'
